features.Back to ISRO Timeline EOS: 03 is a state-of-the-art agile Earth observation satellite which will be placed in a Geosynchronous Transfer Orbit by GSLV-F10. Subsequently, the satellite will reach the final geostationary orbit using its onboard propulsion system. मिशन कालावधि / Mission Life : 10 years शक्ति / Power: 2280 W प्रमोचक राकेट / Launch Vehicle: GSLV-F10 / EOS-03 उपग्रह का प्रकार / Type of Satellite: Earth Observation निर्माता / Manufacturer: ISRO स्‍वामी / Owner: ISRO अनुप्रयोग / Application: Earth Observation कक्षा का प्रकार / Orbit Type: GTO More Details EOS-03 GSLV-F10/EOS-03 Gallery GSLV-F10/EOS-03 Brochure PDF - 418 KB More Details EOS-03 GSLV-F10/EOS-03 Gallery GSLV-F10/EOS-03 Brochure PDF - 418 KB
